# pdxrlangsite

`distill` website for PDX R User Group. https://pdxr.netlify.app

## Setting up `distill` on your computer

Install the `distill` package on your machine:

```
install.packages("distill")
```
## Editing the website

Fork the repository, and clone onto your machine.

You can edit the website in the `.Rmd` files. 

## Building the Website

Build the website on your machine by using the `Build Website` button under the "Build" tab (it's usually on the top right of the RStudio Interface).

Commit the files into the repo. 

Submit a pull request
